review: Makes watching Amazon Prime a breeze. Used to rely on my playstation to watch, which was a hassle. Now with the included remote, just click and start. The Wifi connection is good and never froze as some other reviewers reported. We have 60 mb, which may be the reason?
author: Tintin

review: I am still trying to figure out how to use it!!!! Not sure if it is all it is cracked up to be.
author: Susan Pickett

review: I spend half my life in a hotel and this works perfectly! It easily plugs into the hotel tv and it allows you to log into the passcode secured hotel wifi system which my Roku stick could not do. This is a God-send for travelers!
author: DB in Oregon "DB in Oregon"

review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick,  Works great and has so many things available to do.  It is well worth the money.  Have had it just a few days and; well pleased with the performance.

review: Fantastic change. I had a Roku 3 and it was the slowest piece of garbage I have ever owned. The fire stick is everything it says on the box and more. Love it!
